sentence.text: Recently, a new type of limb-girdle muscular dystrophy (LGMD type 2Z) has been identified due to a missense mutation in protein O-linked glycosylation (protein O-glucosyltransferase-Rumi), an enzyme capable of adding glucose to a distinct serine residue of epidermal growth factor-like repeats containing a C-X-S-X-(P/A)-C consensus sequence such as Notch receptors.
